mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (customer_id,name, email, phone_number, address) values (#{customerId},#{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result FROM customer WHERE customer_Id = #{customerId}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result FROM customer WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 1 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result FROM customer WHERE phone_Number = #{phoneNumber}
